Bag of Coins.NAME: Bag of Coins
Bag of Coins.FLAVOR: Borrowed from Neow by the first Goldsmith. Neow now requires compensation while in the spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage taken in combat loses you gold instead. Suffer from Neow's Tax.

Fools Gold.NAME: Fool's Gold
DESCRIPTIONS: You are bankrupt at 75 gold or fewer instead of 50.

Credit.NAME: Credit
Credit.FLAVOR: Only 2500% APR. Terms and conditions apply.
DESCRIPTIONS: You are prosperous at 350 gold or more instead of 400.
